name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: High-back ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and breathable mesh back. Designed for maximum comfort during long work hours, featuring a sturdy steel base and smooth-rolling casters.

name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with advanced noise-cancellation technology, 40mm dynamic drivers, and 30-hour battery life. Includes soft ear cushions, touch controls, and compatible with multiple Bluetooth devices.

name: Stainless Steel Kitchen Knife Set
description: Professional 6-piece knife set with high-carbon stainless steel blades, ergonomic handles, and wooden block storage. Includes chef's knife, bread knife, utility knife, santoku knife, and paring knife.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p HD wireless security camera with night vision, two-way audio, motion detection, and cloud storage. Works with smartphone app for real-time monitoring and alerts.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery life, and built-in microphone for hands-free calls. Comes with rugged design suitable for outdoor adventures.

name: Cast Iron Dutch Oven
description: Pre-seasoned 5.5-quart cast iron dutch oven with enamel coating. Versatile for stovetop and oven use, perfect for slow cooking, braising, and baking. Available in vibrant blue color.

name: Standing Desk Converter
description: Height-adjustable desk converter with smooth pneumatic lift mechanism. Fits most desks, supports up to 15kg, with separate keyboard and monitor platforms for ergonomic workspace.

name: Smart LED Light Bulbs (4-Pack)
description: Wi-Fi enabled LED smart bulbs with 16 million colors, adjustable brightness, and smartphone app control. Compatible with Alexa and Google Home for voice commands.

name: Yoga Mat with Carrying Strap
description: Extra-thick (6mm) eco-friendly yoga mat with non-slip surface. Includes free carrying strap, perfect for all types of yoga and floor exercises. Comes in sage green color.

name: Programmable Coffee Maker
description: 12-cup programmable coffee maker with built-in grinder, thermal carafe, and delay brew function. Stainless steel design with digital display and automatic shut-off.

name: Wireless Charging Mouse Pad
description: Large mousepad with integrated Qi wireless charging pad. Smooth surface for precise mouse tracking, compatible with most smartphones and wireless charging devices.

name: Resistance Band Set
description: 5-piece resistance band set with different tension levels. Includes carry bag and exercise guide. Ideal for strength training, physical therapy, and home workouts.

name: Smart WiFi Power Strip
description: 6-outlet smart power strip with individual socket control via smartphone app. Features surge protection, energy monitoring, and voice assistant compatibility.

name: Electric Kettle with Temperature Control
description: 1.7L stainless steel electric kettle with precise temperature control for different tea and coffee types. Features rapid boil, keep-warm function, and auto shut-off.

name: Noise-Reducing Desk Divider
description: Freestanding acoustic desk divider with sound-absorbing material. Helps reduce noise in open office environments, available in multiple neutral colors.

name: Compact Air Purifier
description: True HEPA air purifier for rooms up to 200 sq ft. Removes 99.97% of particles, includes activated carbon filter for odors and smart air quality indicator.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description: Vertical ergonomic wireless mouse with adjustable DPI, silent click technology, and rechargeable battery. Designed to reduce wrist strain during extended computer use.

name: Premium Blender with Travel Cups
description: 1200W high-performance blender with 6 blade settings, includes two personal travel cups. Perfect for smoothies, crushing ice, and food processing.

name: Smart Indoor Garden
description: Hydroponic indoor herb garden with LED grow lights, automatic watering system, and smartphone app monitoring. Grows up to 6 different herbs simultaneously.

name: Compact Massage Gun
description: Portable percussion massage gun with 4 intensity levels and 6 interchangeable heads. Rechargeable battery with up to 4 hours of use, ideal for muscle recovery.

name: Smart Digital Picture Frame
description: 10-inch HD touchscreen digital picture frame with WiFi connectivity. Sync photos from cloud services, includes motion sensor and automatic brightness adjustment.

name: Sous Vide Precision Cooker
description: Bluetooth-enabled sous vide precision cooker with adjustable clamp, temperature control to 0.1 degree, and smartphone app recipe guidance.

name: Noise-Canceling True Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 8-hour battery life, touch controls, and water-resistant design. Includes charging case with additional 24-hour playtime.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Lightweight, portable laptop stand with 7 adjustable height levels. Compatible with laptops 10-15.6 inches, made from heat-dissipating aluminum alloy.

name: Smart Water Bottle
description: Intelligent water bottle that tracks hydration, reminds you to drink, and syncs with fitness apps. Includes temperature display and leak-proof design.
